FuncDef: This command configures the syslog facility. The syslog facility is an information field associated with a syslog message. It is defined by the syslog protocol and provides an indication of which part of the system originated the message.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the syslog facility keyword. Values-kernel, user, mail, systemd, auth, syslogd, printer, netnews, uucp, cron, authpriv, ftp, ntp, logaudit, logalert, cron2, local0, local1, local2, local3, local4, local5, local6, local7.
